Keywords: Battleworld: Other , Cosmic , Latveria , Scientist
Real Name: Owen Reese
Special Powers
MOLECULAR MANIPULATION: Smoke Cloud as FREE. // FREE: Choose up to three non-debris terrain markers within range. Replace those markers with any combination of hindering, water, or blocking terrain markers. At the beginning of your next turn, remove all markers placed this way.

Text Change: MOLECULAR MANIPULATION

Awesome, definitely the best Rare in FFFF,At 100 is good but at 30 points is the best option for control the field while provide a modest taxi and with Rules2021 a valuable Outwit.Vs Batman Prime was the MVP in a cosmic team (before Elders of The Universe team) I'm not sure what's the best equipment for him but I'm sure he's gonna see play at every format(except pauper)

Daunting Mountain
I get that his power level is nigh-omnipotent, but Molecule Man has the least willpower and is the most outwittable of any Marvel character. Cosmic Energy barely fits haha
February 21, 2021
Maxphyte
Played a sealed match with a buddy and Molecule Man’s trait was such a game changer. At 100 he hovers between all right and down right good. I have to see how effective he is at his lower line.
February 11, 2021
Goop
Free smoke cloud every turn is great on its own, getting to turn some of them into blocking is even better. Overall he's just awesome even without that. 3 bolts, power cosmic, pen plast, outwit. At click 4 though his damage tanks and he strictly becomes a barrier/incap piece but still good stats with outwit and perplex. He might actually be a better deal though at his 30pt line. 100pts is a lot these days.
